commit.message:
natFileWin32.cc (_access): Renamed.

	* java/io/natFileWin32.cc (_access): Renamed.
	(_stat): Likewise.
	* java/io/natFile.cc (_access): Renamed.
	(_stat): Likewise.
	* java/io/File.java (access, stat): Add leading `_' to name.
	Updated all callers.

From-SVN: r44124

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,12 @@
+2001-07-18  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
+
+	* java/io/natFileWin32.cc (_access): Renamed.
+	(_stat): Likewise.
+	* java/io/natFile.cc (_access): Renamed.
+	(_stat): Likewise.
+	* java/io/File.java (access, stat): Add leading `_' to name.
+	Updated all callers.
+
 2001-07-18  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
 
 	For PR java/2812:
